thread.title: Prepare for holiday season during design seminar
thread.title_full: Prepare for holiday season during design seminar

author: Times-News
title: Prepare for holiday season during design seminar
text: Posted Oct. 18, 2015 at 12:01 AM By Times-News Posted Oct. 18, 2015 at 12:01 AM McLEANSVILLE — Replacements Ltd.’s Holiday Design & Entertaining seminars will be from 11 a.m. to 1 p.m. Nov. 6-7 at the world’s largest retailer of old and new china, crystal, silver and collectibles. “Not only will we talk about the latest holiday color and design trends, we’re going to look beyond the glitz and glitter to show you how the Victorian era continues to influence today’s holiday traditions and entertaining,” said visual designer John Griffith. “I’ll share some of my personal favorite tips and trips on ways to trim the perfect tree, plus we’ll offer fun how-to ideas for creating festive centerpieces and main table displays. These seminars are a great way to jump-start your holiday planning.” The seminars include a light lunch. These events will be locally catered and cost to participate is $11.95 per person. Registration is required by Nov. 3, due to limited space. For more information or to sign up for the event, contact John Griffith at (336) 697-3000, ext. 2954 or email john.griffith @replace ments.com . Replacements is at 1089 Knox Road, off I-85/40 (exit 132). By Times-News
